list_definition.definition: of a number of people etc combined into one group

list_definition.definition: of a noun, taking a singular verb but standing for many things taken as a whole
a farm or organization run by a group of workers for the good of all of them

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The peasant farmers worked on collectives.
